description: The term '''hyphy''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|h|aɪ|f|iː}} {{respell|HY|fee}}) is an [[Oakland, California]], slang meaning "hyperactive". More specifically, it is an adjective describing the [[hip-hop]] music and the culture associated with the Oakland area. The term was first coined by rapper [[Keak da Sneak]].
